abstract: Silicon Valley financiers got the Hollywood treatment in “Social Network,” the new film about Facebook, but the courtship between the technology and entertainment hubs has heated up with V.C. deal values in Los Angeles nearly doubling this year.
snippet: Silicon Valley financiers got the Hollywood treatment in “Social Network,” the new film about Facebook, but the courtship between the technology and entertainment hubs has heated up with V.C. deal values in Los Angeles nearly doubling this year.
lead_paragraph: Silicon Valley financiers got the Hollywood treatment in “Social Network,” the new film about Facebook, but the courtship between the technology and entertainment hubs has heated up with venture capital deal values in Los Angeles nearly doubling this year, Reuters reports.

headline.main: Venture Capitalists Set Sights on Hollywood
